events.message: Customer reported a minor collision involving their car at an intersection with moderate front-end damage.
The claim was categorised as an Auto Accident case based on the vehicle collision details provided.
An agent was assigned to the claim to assist the customer through the next steps of the vehicle accident process.
Acknowledgement of the car accident claim has been sent to the customer confirming receipt of initial report.
Customer was requested to provide photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report for further review.
Received photographs of the damaged car and official police report to support the investigation of the accident.
Investigation into the vehicle collision circumstances has begun to determine liability and damage evaluation.
Investigation concluded, confirming the customer was not at fault and damages align with reported collision.
A settlement offer has been proposed covering repair costs and rental vehicle expenses during the repair period.
Customer provided positive feedback thanking the agent for the timely resolution and clear communication.
The insurance claim for the auto accident has been officially approved following settlement agreement acceptance.
Payment for vehicle repairs and associated costs has been processed and sent to the approved repair shop.
The auto accident claim file has been officially closed after payment confirmation and customer satisfaction.
